text: Jaroslav Staněk (born 24 February 1940 in Opava-Podvihov) is a former male international table tennis player from Czechoslovakia. ==Table tennis career== He won a bronze medal at the 1967 World Table Tennis Championships with Vladimir Miko. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Czech male table tennis players Category:Living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:1940 births Category:Sportspeople from Opava
title: Jaroslav Staněk
